summary: An author spent a year and a half filming what happened as a new apartment building was built in the El Chino neighborhood of Barcelona. En Construccion focuses less on the practicalities ... See full summary »
cast: Juana Rodríguez Molina|Iván Guzmán Jiménez|Juan López López|Juanma López|Pedro Robles|Santiago Segade|Abdel Aziz El Mountassir|Abdelsalam Madris|Antonio Atar|Pere Lluís Artigas|Jesús M. title: En construcción
